comments: Dirichlet convolution of b_n=1 with c_n=2^(n-1).Equals row sums of triangle A143425, & inverse MÃ¶bius transform (A051731) of [1, 2, 4, 8,...]. - _Gary W. Adamson_, Aug 14 2008
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
formula: G.f.: Sum_{n>0} x^n/(1-2*x^n). - _Vladeta Jovovic_, Nov 14 2002a(n) = 1/2 * A055895(n). - _Joerg Arndt_, Aug 14 2012G.f.: Sum_{n>=1} 2^(n-1) * x^n / (1 - x^n). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 21 2014G.f.: Sum_{n>=1} x^n * Sum_{d|n} 1/(1 - x^d)^(n/d). - _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 21 2014a(n) ~ 2^(n-1). - _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Sep 09 2014
prog: (PARI) A034729(n) = sumdiv(n,k,2^(k-1)) \\ _Michael B. Porter_, Mar 11 2010(PARI) {a(n)=polcoeff(sum(m=1,n,2^(m-1)*x^m/(1-x^m +x*O(x^n))),n)}for(n=1,40,print1(a(n),", ")) \\ _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 21 2014(PARI) {a(n)=local(A=x+x^2);A=sum(m=1,n,x^m*sumdiv(m,d,1/(1 - x^(m/d) +x*O(x^n))^d) );polcoeff(A,n)}for(n=1,40,print1(a(n),", ")) \\ _Paul D. Hanna_, Aug 21 2014
